title: Electric Company Font
content:
Does anyone know what the font is called that was used on the televisison show "Electric Company". Here it is.

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130506031730im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ec_logo_800_3588.jpg)
author: csmautz

comments.content: No, it's a Letraset font called "Neon." See a sample [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130506031730/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide03.html).

Manfred Klein made a font, named [Multistrokes](http://web.archive.org/web/20130506031730/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/klein03/deco/multistroke.htm) which looks quite like it. Don't know about the legal situation in this case.

Resurrection!

Any other typefaces like this? Has Neon been reissued?
